experience.employer: George Washington University, Department of Computer Science
description: Performed analysis of bias in ride-hailing pricing algorithms in Chicago, including data collection, experiment design, and novel metric development; first author of project accepted at AAAI/ACM Conference on Artificial Intelligence, Ethics, and Society (AAAI/ACM AIES 2021)

Contributed to analysis of Twitter content for biases related to COVID-19 outbreak, performing state of the art techniques for bias measurement on GloVe word embeddings; 2nd author of paper accepted at IEEE International Conference on Semantic Computing
Performed teaching assistant role in introductory machine learning course and introductory python programming course

experience.employer: UVA Center for Advanced Vision Science
description: Performed regression analysis on large patient insurance claim dataset to predict patient survival and determine drug efficacy; co-author of two resulting publications in Nature Communications and PNAS
Ported and analyzed large patient insurance claim data set on a high performance cloud computing platform using Slurm workload manager
Designed pipeline for diagnosing and deploying fixes on Openstack cloud architecture using long short-term memory neural network developed using Keras, successfully correcting >80% of detected faults
Implemented real-time anomaly detection on Openstack cloud architecture using autoencoder neural network developed using Keras
Project was selected to be presented to Nokia Bell Labs senior leadership and CEO from among all other interns and given Nokia Bell Labs Innovation Project Award
Led testing and validation of state eligibility notice generation system
Created design documentation for application additions
Communicated between client stakeholders and development team to facilitate adaptation of application change requests
Reviewed and corrected student Node.js JavaScript code
Provided feedback to students on their code and project ideas
Directed student project development and JavaScript programming
